name: IndieDrive
description:
This is a project under development and I decided to make it available for everyone to try and play. This game has no menu, options or any of that, there is only one car on an infinite route, as long as you can carry fuel you can still drive. Is a simple conceptual game. It seems that some computers do not see the changes on the board, there are things that I have to solve yet.Will appreciate any contribution you can make, the funds you receive allow me to continue programming.
Plataform/Requirements : PC, Windows, Videocard 1Gb
